attributes.action: send Jacqui Smith a bath  plug
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If a cabinet minister is so greedy that she will charge 88p for a bath plug to the taxpayer on her expenses, instead of paying it out of her not inconsiderable salary, then we should all send her a bath or sink plug through the post to remind her of her greed.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
